entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
